text: int main ( ) { int n , l , i , sum , count , actsum ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int first ; while ( n ) { scanf ( "%d" , & l ) ; int a [ ( l * l + l ) / 2 + 1 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= ( ( l * l + l ) / 2 ) ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i - 1 ] ) ; } count = 0 ; actsum = a [ 0 ] + a [ 1 ] + a [ 2 ] ; sum = 0 ; first = a [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < ( ( l * l + l ) / 2 ) ; i ++ ) { sum += a [ i ] + a [ i + 1 ] + first ; first = a [ i ] ; i ++ ; i += count ; count += 1 ; if ( sum >= actsum ) actsum = sum ; sum = 0 ; } printf ( "%d\n" , actsum ) ; n -- ; } return 0 ; }
